naslov: Moderna vila sa bazenom Krk, 165 m2 + okućnica (prodaja)
opis: Novosagrađena vila B2 s bazenom smještena na otoku Krku, stambene površine 165 m2 se prodaje. Nalazi se u naselju Brzac. Vila se sastoji od prizemlja i kata te pripadajuće okućnice. U prizemlju se nalazi ulazni prostor, kuhinja s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom, spavaća soba s vlastitom kupaonicom, wc, spremište, sauna, dva spremišta te natkrivena terasa. Na katu su smještene tri spavaće sobe s izlazima na terasu, dvije kupaonice, garderoba, natkrivena i nenatkrivena terasa. Vila ima predivan pogled na more i kompletno je završena. Unutrašnjost je u potpunosti namještena i kao takva se prodaje. Okoliš je uređen sa zelenilom i sustavom navodnjavanja te ogradom na daljinski. Oprema: - priprema za grijanje vode u bazenu toplinskom pumpom - električno podno grijanje cijelog objekta, moguća regulacija preko Wi-fi-ja - priprema za fotonaponsku elektranu na krovu - namještaj , osnovni (kuhinja po mjeri sa aparatima, stol stolice, garnitura za dnevni boravak, kreveti u spavaćim sobama, ormari, kupaonski osnovni namještaj i sanitarije, TV u dnevnom boravku - klima uređaji u svakoj sobi i dnevnom boravku LG Art cool - rasvjetna tijela - Semelrock opločnici -"Cifre" keramika - Porotherm opeka - STO fasadni sustav - panoramske podizno klizne stijene, PVC - priprema za punjene električnih vozila Tlocrt vile: natkriveni ulaz:     7,00 m2 ulaz:                        7,56 m2 soba 1:                    7,83 m2 kupaonica 1:          3,71 m2 kuhinja, blagovaonica i dn. boravak: 42,63 m2 spremište 1:                                            4,87 m2 wc:                                                            3,71 m2 natkrivena terasa:                                 13,49 m2 prizemlje ukupno:                                89,26 m2 K A T Stubište:             6,07 m2 hodnik:               6,93 m2 soba 2:               12,76 m2 kupaonica 2:      5,72 m2 soba 3:               11,70 m2 soba 4:               16,35 m2 kupaonica 3:      5,76 m2 garderoba:         3,58 m2 natkrivena terasa: 6,67 m2 1.kat  ukupno:                         75,54 m2 UKUPNO:                        164,80     m2 Bruto građevinski volumen BGV GRAĐEVINE:           494,37 m3 BGV  BAZENA:                 25,16 m3 BGV  UKUPNO:               519,53 m3 Mjesto Brzac se nalazi na zapadnoj strani otoka i udaljeno je kilometar od plaže. Pruža prekrasan pogled na otok Cres. Stari dio mjesta posjeduje kamene kuće i uske uličice. U blizini je Vela Jana – uvala s plažom i malom marinom. Tri kilometra od sela, na obali nalazi se Glavotok s franjevačkim samostanom iz 15. st. i malenom crkvicom na samom moru. Brzac je 15 km udaljen od grada Krka i 13 km od naselja Malinska. Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon 098 / 915 - 5643 ( Ivan ) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01 / 3866 - 844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com Newly  built   villa   B2   with   pool   located   on   the   island   of   Krk  ,   living   area   of   165   m2   for   sale  .   It   is   located   in   the   village   of   Brzac  .   The   villa   consists   of   ground   floor   and   first   floor   and   an   associated   garden  .   On   the   ground   floor   there   is   an   entrance   hall  ,   a   kitchen   with   a   dining   room   and   a   living   room  ,   a   bedroom   with   its   own   bathroom  ,   a   toilet  ,   a   storage   room  ,   a   sauna  ,   two   storage   rooms   and   a   covered   terrace  .   Upstairs   there   are   three   bedrooms   with   access   to   the   terrace  ,   two   bathrooms  ,   a   dressing   room  ,   a   covered   and   an   uncovered   terrace  .   The   villa   has   a   beautiful   view   of   the   sea   and   is   completely   finished  .   The   interior   is   fully   furnished   and   as   such   is   for   sale  .   The   environment   is   landscaped   with   greenery   and   an   irrigation   system   and   a   remote   fence  . Equipment: preparation   for   heating   the   water   in   the   pool   with   a   heat   pump   -   electric   underfloor   heating   of   the   entire   building  ,   possible   regulation   via   Wi  -  Fi   -   preparation   for   a   photovoltaic   power   plant   on   the   roof   -   furniture  ,   basic   (  custom-  made   kitchen   with   appliances  ,   table  ,   chairs  ,   living   room   furniture  ,   beds   in   the   bedrooms  ,   wardrobes  ,   bathroom   basic   furniture   and   sanitary   ware  ,   TV   in   the   living   room   -   air   conditioners   in   every   room   and   living   room   LG   Art   cool   -   Lighting   fixtures   -   Semelrock   Paving   -  "  Figures  "   ceramics   -   Porotherm   brick   -   STO   fa  çade   system   -   Panoramic   lift  -  and  -  slide   walls  ,   PVC   -   preparation   for   charged   electric   vehicles. Floor   plan   of   the   villa  : Covered   entrance  :   7  .  00   m2 Entrance  :   7  .  56   m2 Bedroom   1  :   7  .  83   m2 Bathroom   1  :   3  .  71   m2 kitchen  ,   dining   room ,  Living   space  :   42  .  63   m2 Storage   1  :   4  .  87   m2 toilet  :   3  .  71   m2 Covered   terrace  :   13  .  49   m2 Total   ground floor  :   89  .  26   m2 K   A   T Staircase  :   6  .  07   m2 Hallway  :   6  .  93   m2 Room   2  :   12  .  76   m2 Bathroom   2  :   5  .  72   m2 Room   3  :   11  .  70   m2 Bedroom   4  :   16  .  35   m2 Bathroom   3  :   5  .  76   m2 Wardrobe  :   3  .  58   m2 Covered   terrace  :   6  .  67   m2 1st   floor   total  :   75  .  54   m2 TOTAL  :   164  ,  80   m2 Gross   construction   volume BGV   BUILDINGS  :   494  .  37   m3 BGV   SWIMMING   POOL  :   25  ,  16   m3 BGV   TOTAL  :   519  .  53   m3 The   town   of   Brzac   is   located   on   the   west   side   of the   island   and   is   a   kilometer   away   from   the   beach  .   It   offers   a   beautiful   view   of   the   island   of   Cres  .   The   old   part   of   the   place   has   stone   houses   and   narrow   streets  .   Nearby   is   Vela   Jana   –   a   bay   with   a   beach   and   a   small   marina  .   Three   kilometers   from   the   village  ,   on   the   coast  ,   there   is   Glavotok   with   a   Franciscan   monastery   from   the   15th   century  .   and   a   small   church   right   by   the   sea  .   The   rapids   are   15   km   away   from   the   town   of   Krk   and   13   km   from   the   village   of   Malinska  .
